away and move. Now they substitute teach somewhere in Nevada. :/ ﻿

"Then the big mean giant gobbled up the whole village, and lived happily 
ever after!" The bunnies gasp, then they wail REALLY LOUD it causes a mess 
in Rabbit's house and causes the windows to pop off!
